title: ‘He’s Back on Track … Everything Is Possible’: Mark Cavendish Keeps Faith in Tour de France Quest
content:
Cavendish's trainer and mentor says experience and bullish self-belief will be key to mission for 35th Tour stage win: 'The confidence is there for Mark, and the whole team.'

Read the full article at ‘He’s Back on Track … Everything Is Possible’: Mark Cavendish Keeps Faith in Tour de France Quest on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
